name: Large Trade Ship
description:
You may trade 2 resources of the left
or right neighboring region for any
1 other resource of your choice.

name: Gold Ship
description:
During your turn, you may trade
2 gold for any 1 other resource
as often as you wish

name: Brick Ship
description:
During your turn, you may trade
2 brick for any 1 other resource
as often as you wish

name: Grain Ship
description:
During your turn, you may trade
2 grain for any 1 other resource
as often as you wish

name: Lumber Ship
description:
During your turn, you may trade
2 Lumber for any 1 other resource
as often as you wish

name: Ore Ship
description:
During your turn, you may trade
2 ore for any 1 other resource
as often as you wish

name: Wool Ship
description:
During your turn, you may trade
2 wool for any 1 other resource
as often as you wish
